This family-friendly B&B features six cheerful, eclectically furnished, en suite rooms with mountain views and a mini-menagerie of pigs, rabbits and chickens.

This bright and friendly little bistro is consistently packed full of happy customers thanks to its mantra (local, sustainable); its roster of fresh, expertly executed dishes (spiced lamb chops, pearl-barley risotto, slow-cooked pork belly); and its professional service.
